description:
Don't ruin your ride with plastic-tasting water. The Purist Cycling Water Bottle features an incredibly thin (20 nanometers) silicone dioxide coating that resists taste, odour and stains so you get fresh water with every gulp.

  • Soft LDPE body is easy to squeeze and BPA-free
  • Thin silicone coating prevents staining or tastes to keep your water pure and bottle clean
  • High-flow MoFlo cap is leakproof when closed
  • Fits most standard bottle cages
  • To clean: shake with soapy water. Do not scrub – this could damage the silicone layer
name: MEC Purist 650ml Cycling Water Bottle
